code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Authenticator as Device Authenticator
    actor User
    participant Browser
    participant PasskeyAPI as Passkeys API
    participant Backend as Your Backend

    User->>Browser: Initiates registration
    Browser->>PasskeyAPI: POST /v1/signup/start (Education_ClassroomService)
    PasskeyAPI->>PasskeyAPI: Generate challenge
    PasskeyAPI->>Browser: Return challenge, rpID, userID
    Browser->>Authenticator: Create credential (Education_GradeSync)
    Authenticator->>User: Prompt for biometric/PIN
    User->>Authenticator: Provide biometric/PIN
    Authenticator->>Browser: Return credential
    Browser->>Backend: POST /signup (Education_StudentDB)
    Backend->>Backend: Validate user details
    Backend->>PasskeyAPI: POST /v1/signup/finish (Education_GradeSync)
    PasskeyAPI->>PasskeyAPI: Verify and store credential
    PasskeyAPI->>Backend: Return verification result
    Backend->>Backend: Store user details
    Backend->>Browser: Registration success
    Browser->>User: Display success message

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Education_ClassroomService 和 Education_GradeSync 这一块。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 Education_ClassroomService处理。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Education_ClassroomService处理'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Education_StudentDB 和 Education_GradeSync。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Education_StudentDB 和 Education_GradeSync'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
